meanings.definition: A fermented beverage made from pineapple rinds and spices.
meanings.sent1: I tried making tepaches at home using pineapple peels and some spices.
meanings.sent2: The street vendor sold refreshing tepaches on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: At the party, they played a game where the loser had to chug a whole pitcher of tepaches.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a fizzy glass of tepaches.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the tepaches filled the room, making everyone curious to try it.
